scripts.upload: npm run build && aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://opsdepartment.com/demo/index.html && aws s3 cp dist/dgts.js s3://opsdepartment.com/demo/dgts.js && aws s3 cp dist/PROMPT.md s3://opsdepartment.com/demo/PROMPT.md
scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=iife --global-name=DGTS --outfile=dist/dgts.js && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp src/PROMPT.md dist/PROMPT.md && cp src/config.json dist/config.json
